name: GoogleIdentityToolkit
summary: Google Identity Toolkit enables app and website makers to easily support multiple authentication options for their end users.
description: Google Identity Toolkit enables app and website makers to easily support multiple authentication options for their end users. The service currently supports password authentication in addition to federated sign in with Google, Facebook, Yahoo, Microsoft, Paypal, and AOL. Even non-technical developers are able to add future login options and migrate existing users with simple configuration changes.
